Changelog
=========

1.2 (2009/12/18)
----------------

* added `-a` option for displaying all menu items of the week at once

* more compact and readable representation of menus

* pep8 check

* depending on python2.5 (for datetime.strptime)

* removed dependency on elementtree (shipped with python2.5)


1.1 (2009/11/11)
----------------

* fixed error in case no menu can be found for the current day


1.0 (2009/10/01)
----------------

* Initial release
